title: Badrinath
occurrences: he prays lord badrinath every day his name is bheeshma narain.
Badrinath!
It's badrinath, the holy shrine of lord sri hari...
hail lord of badrinath!
I warned not to go to badrinath, let's stay back in bellary, uncle.
Impossible! Nobody can escape from badri in badrinath.
Some atheist is here, send him out from badrinath.
Has megastar visited badrinath? - I don't know.
You offer prayers every day with your hands to lord badrinath,
Who are you folding your hands for? Badri or lord badrinath?
You don't have much devotion towards lord badrinath.
Now i like badri as well as lord badrinath.
Forget it, not just you, not even your lord badrinath can do it.
You must offer brahma lotus a favourite of badrinath while making the wish.
There's a young man badri in badrinath,
Listen carefully, devotees to badrinath!
We're going to badrinath to mix my father's mortal remains there.
Badrinath is closed, come after 6 months.
most auspicious day is when the badrinath temple reopens after 6 months.
The girl who came to badrinath without belief in god,
Guru, i swear on lord badrinath, i have not loved any girl till now.
They've ordered badri not to step into badrinath for creating trouble for his love.
badrinath got shaken up, brought together and united us...
Love! - No, badri! My badrinath!
If you don't go, she'll lose faith in badrinath.
If you don't go, she'll lose faith in badrinath.
It's badrinath everywhere, whether i open or close my eyes...
it's badrinath at dawn and when i wake up...
badrinath fills my dreams, and my thoughts...
it's badrinath in me...
it's badrinath with me...
long live badrinath!
Badrinath is flamboyant swordsman...
badrinath is death...
badrinath is the lightning...
badrinath is with you...
badrinath is in you...
You promised on badrinath and broke it.
Not only in your badrinath, there's no god in this nature itself.
